backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining data types, in-memory maps, authorization/storage mixins, and state variables for glossary, articles, research papers, blogs, market data, and admin operations.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that returns the previous actor state unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing glossary-related frontend changes, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation outlining staged deployment steps, checks, and troubleshooting guidelines for retrying deployments.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme tokens and dark-mode variables with base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts, icons, and mounting the React application.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Overview of deployment helper scripts contained in the scripts directory.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Bash script automating build and deployment stages with full logging, colored output, and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's routing, theming, data fetching, and maintenance-mode handling, rendering either a maintenance screen or the main layout with header, footer, and pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo image with error handling and a text fallback when the logo fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Renders a cash‑flow table with optional running balance and supports CSV export.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty placeholder file for a bar chart component.
Draws an SVG donut chart showing invested vs earned amounts with a fallback empty state.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements a floating chat assistant with message handling, intent detection, backend querying, and disclaimer logic.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder file for custom‑domain FAQ content.
Empty placeholder file for custom‑domain setup guide content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer containing a live or closing NIFTY 50 ticker based on Indian market hours and stock data.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI and logic to export, upload, parse, validate, and restore glossary snapshots, supporting merge and replace modes.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Displays a panel to publish a predefined batch of C‑terms into the glossary with confirmation and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, theme toggle, calculator menus, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Displays a full‑page maintenance notice with branding and a status message.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Exports a batch of static C‑term glossary entries for backend bulk import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for maintenance mode, admin checks, user profiles, chat, and glossary term fetching with diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and theme tokens for light and dark finance-themed modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy content using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Shows financial article categories in tabs and loads articles per category with a list component.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements a calculator for APY contributions based on age and desired pension with form inputs and results.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full blog post with metadata, tags, content, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays a list of blogs with loading and error states, showing cards with titles, dates, previews, and tags, and navigates to individual blog pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a CAGR calculator with inputs for initial value, final value, and years, computing and displaying the growth rate.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows categorized lists of financial calculators with descriptions and navigation links to their respective pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact and feedback form using actor-based submission, with email links and form validation states.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers about investment risks and clarifies that the site provides educational content only.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that calculates EMI, total interest, and repayment based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure. Includes form inputs, navigation, and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A calculator page that computes EPF contributions, interest, and maturity balance using salary and contribution percentages. Provides input fields and displays calculated projections.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: A fixed deposit calculator supporting simple and compound interest with inputs for principal, rate, and tenure. Computes maturity amount and interest earned.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Admin panel for viewing, searching, and sorting user feedback with authentication and access control. Handles login, loading states, and displays feedback in a table.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Compares fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan calculations, computing interest and repayment differences. Accepts loan inputs and shows both methods' results.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: A glossary viewer with search, grouping, admin tools, and term navigation, fetching terms and rendering grouped, searchable results.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: A gratuity calculator using salary and years of service to compute eligibility and estimated gratuity as per Indian rules.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: A GST calculator page that takes an amount and GST rate to compute CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount, with formatted currency output.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: A home loan EMI calculator that computes EMI, total interest, and total repayment from loan amount, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature sections, and navigation buttons linking to learning, glossary, and research pages.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: An HRA calculator that computes exempt and taxable HRA based on salary, rent, and city type with a simple input form.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Fetches and displays financial learning sections in an accordion, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump-sum compound interest calculator with inputs, results, and a generated cash‑flow schedule.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS corpus, annuity amount, and pension based on monthly contributions, age, and return rate.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest using compound growth inputs for investment, rate, and duration.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates PPF maturity, total investment, and interest through yearly compounding inputs.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a recurring deposit calculator with inputs for monthly investment, interest rate, and tenure, computing maturity, interest, and total deposits.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI/RBI guidelines and fraud awareness info using tabs, alerts, and informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and lists research papers with download support, handling loading states and empty results.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Implements a simple interest calculator page with inputs for principal, rate, and time, and displays calculated interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Provides a page comparing simple and compound interest with inputs for principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a SIP calculator that computes future value, invested amount, and returns, plus generates a cash‑flow schedule.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates SSY maturity, interest, and eligible deposit years based on yearly investment, girl’s age, and start year.
Implements step-up SIP calculators using fixed amount or percentage increments, computing invested amount, returns, and future value.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Simulates systematic withdrawals from an initial corpus, calculating total withdrawn, final balance, and net gain or loss.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Creates an XIRR calculator allowing multiple dated cash flows and uses Newton-Raphson to approximate XIRR.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intents, and generating refusal responses for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Centralizes static asset path creation using Vite base paths for consistent URLs across environments.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Provides helpers to generate labels and build cash flow schedules including monthly, yearly, and simple two-row formats.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV field escaping, array-to-CSV conversion, and a browser CSV download helper.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains utilities for formatting INR currency, Indian-style numbers, and percentages.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions to extract main text and 'Also read' references, and provides term normalization and grouping helpers.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Generates deterministic normalized keys for glossary terms to avoid duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including session storage helpers and hash-query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layout, and animations with plugin support.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining current issues, existing features, and new feature requests related to glossary behavior and persistence.
